permissions: Admins can update inventory estimates. Non-admins can update inventory estimates if they are manager members of the related material supplier or broker.
side_effects: Updates the inventory estimate fields and relationships provided.
validation_notes: Requires <id> argument (inventory estimate ID). At least one of --material-site, --material-type, --estimated-at, --amount-tons, or --description must be provided. --estimated-at must be an ISO 8601 timestamp when provided. --amount-tons must be greater than or equal to 0 when provided. Material type must be generic or related to the material supplier of the site. Providing --material-site or --material-type with an empty value clears the relationship.

flags.name: --amount-tons
flags.validation: Numeric value greater than or equal to 0.
